latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service fails to provide/maintain fire alarm when required
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service utilized swimming facilities that were not approved by appropriate regulatory authorities
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allowed swimming activity to proceed in the absence of required life guard supervision Written safety plan was not on site at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service engaging in aquatic activities observed allowing children less than three years of age to participate in aquatic activities
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service fails to provide/maintain fire alarm when required
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Required food protection procedures were not implemented at time of inspection Holder of food protection certificate was not on site during hours of food preparation activity
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards
